meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive James Hawthorne Jr. Joan Blinn Kristin Morgan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6523.

td.p: James Hawthorne Jr., a special education teacher from Rochester, New York
Joan Blinn, a retired proofreader and editor from Chicago, Illinois
Kristin Morgan, a strategic analyst for NASA from Huntsville, Alabama (whose 5-day cash winnings total $69,098)

tr.td: HAPPIER REWRITTEN NOVEL ENDINGS
THE TRANSPORTER
ON TV 10 YEARS AGO
A LOTTA MOTTO
STATES' MOST POPULOUS CITIES
BIRDS WITHIN WORDS
(Alex: You have to name the bird found within the text of our clue.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '"\'OK, Ishmael, scrunch down so the whole Pequod crew is in the painting! Talk about a catch of the day!"\'')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "'OK, Ishmael, scrunch down so the whole Pequod crew is in the painting! Talk about a catch of the day!"'
